a man going beyond customary or proper bounds or limits.
a dishonest man.
to talk absurdly, indecently or immodestly.
= ಬಾಷ್ಕಳಂಗೆಯ್.
a poison or venom.
a poisoned state caused by the absorption of pathogenic micro-organisms and their products into the blood-stream; sepsis.

the saline, watery fluid continually secreted by the lacrimal glands between the surface of the eye and the eyelid, serving to moisten and lubricate these parts and keep them clear of foreign particles or as the result of excessive joy or grief; tears.
water in the vapour or gaseous state; steam.
a kind of plant.
